title: Build Codetykoons business website with multi-page layout and contact form

requirements.text: Create a Home page with hero section containing headline 'We Build Powerful Digital Solutions', subheading explaining how Codetykoons helps businesses grow online, and CTA button labeled 'Get a Free Consultation'

quotes: Hero section with headline: "We Build Powerful Digital Solutions"

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays headline 'We Build Powerful Digital Solutions'
Subheading explains Codetykoons' value proposition for business growth
CTA button labeled 'Get a Free Consultation' is prominently displayed

requirements.text: Add Services overview section to Home page listing the six core services: Custom Website Development, E-commerce Website Development, Web Applications, SEO Optimization, Website Maintenance & Support, and API Integration

quotes: Custom Website Development, E-commerce Website Development, Web Applications, SEO Optimization, Website Maintenance & Support, API Integration

acceptanceCriteria: Services section displays all six services clearly
Each service is visually distinct and easy to scan

requirements.text: Add Why Choose Us section to Home page highlighting Codetykoons' value propositions and competitive advantages
acceptanceCriteria: Why Choose Us section is present on Home page
Section communicates trust, quality, and expertise

requirements.text: Add Portfolio preview section to Home page showcasing selected completed projects
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio preview section displays project samples
Projects are visually appealing and representative of company work

requirements.text: Add Testimonials section to Home page with client feedback and reviews
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section displays client reviews
Reviews build credibility and trust

requirements.text: Add Contact call-to-action section to Home page encouraging visitors to reach out
acceptanceCriteria: Contact CTA section is present with clear messaging
CTA drives users toward contact action

requirements.text: Add Footer to Home page with social media links
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays social media links
Footer is consistent across all pages

requirements.text: Create About Us page explaining that Codetykoons is dedicated to building scalable, secure, and high-performance web solutions

quotes: About Page: Explain that Codetykoons is dedicated to building scalable, secure, and high-performance web solutions

acceptanceCriteria: About Us page communicates company mission and values
Content emphasizes scalability, security, and performance

requirements.text: Create Services page showcasing all six services (Custom Website Development, E-commerce Website Development, Web Applications, SEO Optimization, Website Maintenance & Support, API Integration) with detailed descriptions

quotes: Custom Website Development, E-commerce Website Development, Web Applications, SEO Optimization, Website Maintenance & Support, API Integration

acceptanceCriteria: Services page lists all six services
Each service has a detailed description
Layout is clean and easy to navigate

requirements.text: Create Portfolio page to display completed projects and case studies
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio page showcases completed projects
Projects are presented with images and descriptions

requirements.text: Create optional Pricing page to display service pricing tiers and packages
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing page displays service tiers clearly
Pricing information is easy to understand

requirements.text: Create Contact Us page with form fields for Name, Email, Phone, and Project Details, and include email and WhatsApp contact options

quotes: Contact Page: Include form fields (Name, Email, Phone, Project Details) Add email and WhatsApp contact option

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes Name, Email, Phone, and Project Details fields
Form submits data to backend for processing
Email and WhatsApp contact options are displayed
Form validation prevents invalid submissions

requirements.text: Store contact form submissions in backend with fields for name, email, phone, and project details

quotes: Contact Page: Include form fields (Name, Email, Phone, Project Details)

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores contact submissions with all four fields
Submissions are retrievable for review

requirements.text: Implement clean, modern, tech-focused design with professional and trustworthy aesthetic using blue and white color palette throughout all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses blue and white as primary colors
Visual style is clean, modern, and professional
Design builds trust and credibility

requirements.text: Implement minimal but bold sections with smooth scroll and modern animations across all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Sections are minimalist yet visually impactful
Smooth scroll behavior is implemented
Modern animations enhance user experience without being distracting

requirements.text: Ensure all pages are mobile responsive with fast loading and modern UI optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
acceptanceCriteria: All pages display correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Page load times are optimized
UI elements scale and adapt to different screen sizes

requirements.text: Implement SEO optimization with professional business tone in content throughout all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Content uses professional, business-appropriate language
Meta tags, headings, and alt text support SEO
Content targets startup, small business, and entrepreneur audiences

requirements.text: Implement navigation structure allowing users to move between Home, About Us, Services, Portfolio, Pricing, and Contact Us pages

quotes: Pages required: 1. Home 2. About Us 3. Services 4. Portfolio 5. Pricing (optional) 6. Contact Us

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu is present on all pages
All six pages are accessible from navigation
Navigation is intuitive and user-friendly

constraints: Use blue and white color palette exclusively as specified
Target audience is startups, small businesses, entrepreneurs, and companies seeking online presence
Reference design structure similar to techvedasoftware.online but maintain unique branding
nonGoals: Do not implement Node.js backend (platform uses Motoko)
Do not integrate third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity
Do not implement real-time chat or WebSocket features
Do not integrate external email services like SendGrid or SMTP
